title: Organic Lavender Shampoo
description: A soothing and nourishing shampoo infused with organic lavender essential oil. Gently cleanses the hair while promoting relaxation.
instructions: Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly.

title: Sensitive Skin Face Cream
description: A gentle face cream formulated for sensitive skin. Fragrance-free and hypoallergenic.
instructions: Apply a small amount to clean face and neck. Use morning and night.

title: Metal Free Nail Polish
description: A non-toxic nail polish free from harmful metals like lead and nickel. Available in vibrant shades.
instructions: Apply two coats for best results.

title: Boost Nail Polish
description: A semi-natural polish without dangerous toxins. Available in vibrant shades.
instructions: Use on clean nails. Apply two coats for best results.

title: Blown away Nail Polish
description: One of our most popular nailpolish due to its long lasting results, and cruelty free testing. Available in vibrant shades.
instructions: Use on clean nails. Apply two coats for best results.

title: Radiant Glow Serum
description: Revitalize your skin with this illuminating serum.
instructions: Apply morning and night after cleansing.

title: Silky Smooth Hair Oil
description: Nourish and tame frizz with this luxurious hair oil.
instructions: Apply a few drops to damp or dry hair.

title: ClearSkin Acne Serum
description: Target stubborn acne with this powerful serum.
instructions: Apply a thin layer to clean skin before moisturizing.

title: Latex-Infused Firming Mask
description: Experience the lifting effect of natural latex in this firming mask.
instructions: Apply a thin layer, avoiding the eye area. Leave on for 10 minutes and rinse thoroughly.

title: LuxeLocks Shampoo
description: A luxurious sulfate-free shampoo infused with argan oil and keratin for smooth, shiny hair.
instructions: Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly.

title: SilkGlow Conditioner
description: A nourishing conditioner enriched with silk proteins and vitamin E for silky-smooth strands.
instructions: Apply to damp hair after shampooing, leave for 2 minutes, and rinse.

title: ReviveRoots Hair Mask
description: An intensive hair mask infused with avocado oil and shea butter to revive dry, damaged hair.
instructions: Apply to clean, towel-dried hair, leave for 10 minutes, and rinse thoroughly.

title: Beard Oil
description: A nourishing blend of argan oil, jojoba oil, and cedarwood essential oil to soften and condition your beard.
instructions: Apply a few drops to your beard daily and massage gently.

title: Beard Balm
description: A styling balm enriched with shea butter, beeswax, and eucalyptus oil for shaping and taming unruly beards.
instructions: Rub a small amount between your palms and apply to your beard for styling.

title: Beard Wash
description: A gentle beard wash infused with chamomile and aloe vera to cleanse without stripping natural oils.
instructions: Wet your beard, apply a small amount of wash, lather, and rinse thoroughly.

title: Oil-Control Cleanser
description: A salicylic acid cleanser that gently removes excess oil without over-drying.
instructions: Use daily to keep skin clear and matte.

title: Matte Moisturizer with SPF
description: Lightweight moisturizer with sun protection. Controls shine and prevents breakouts.
instructions: Apply in the morning after cleansing.

title: Acne-Fighting Clay Mask
description: Sulfur clay mask that absorbs excess oil and minimizes pores.
instructions: Use twice a week for best results.

title: Hydrating Cleanser
description: Gentle cleanser with ceramides and hyaluronic acid to nourish and hydrate dry skin.
instructions: Use morning and night.

title: Rich Moisturizing Crystal Cream
description: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream for intense hydration.
instructions: Apply generously to face and neck.

title: Gentle Body Lotion
description: Rapid Relief Restoring Lotion with alpha-hydroxy acids for soft, smooth skin.
instructions: Use daily after shower

title: Bubblegum Bliss Moisturizer
description: Experience the sweet scent of bubblegum while keeping your skin hydrated. Our moisturizer is infused with imaginary bubblegum extract for a whimsical touch.
instructions: Apply a dollop of Bubblegum Bliss Moisturizer to your face and pretend you're blowing bubblegum bubbles!

title: Unicorn Tears Serum
description: Harness the magical power of unicorn tears! Our serum promises to make your skin glow like a mythical creature.
instructions: Apply Unicorn Tears Serum to your face while chanting, "Sparkle, sparkle, magical glow!"

title: Zombie Apocalypse Exfoliator
description: Scrub away dead skin cells with our spooky exfoliator. Contains crushed zombie bones (not really).
instructions: Apply Zombie Apocalypse Exfoliator in circular motions and pretend you're battling zombies.

title: Boho Exfoliator
description: Scrub away dead skin cells and stop being sad about your teenager skin.
instructions: Apply Boho Exfoliator in circular motions and fight those dirty pores.

title: Boho Mist
description: Spray your face for refreshment and stop being sad about your teenager skin.
instructions: Apply Boho Mist on a clean face, or when you feel tired

title: Oh no! Mist
description: Spray your face for refreshment and stop being sad about your teenager skin, life is good.
instructions: Apply Oh no! Mist on a clean face, or when you feel tired

title: Ultimate Shampoo
description: Deeply healing and nourishing shampoo for dry or damaged hair.
instructions: Apply shampoo in the shower on wet hair and massage, rinse thoroughly

title: Ocean breeze Conditioner
description: Volumizing salty conditioner that leaves your hair full and easy to shape
instructions: Apply conditioner after the shampoo, in the shower on wet hair and massage, rinse thoroughly

title: Sandstorm Shampoo
description: Volumizing shampoo for volume and a salty sandy feel
instructions: Apply shampoo in the shower on wet hair and massage, rinse thoroughly

title: Olive face cream
description: Wonderful olive face cream that mouisturizes your skin deeply with natural ingredients
instructions: Apply on clean skin in the morning

title: Rejuvenizing face cream
description: A pre Anti-aging face cream for preventing fine lines
instructions: Apply cream on clean dry skin every evening for best results

title: Seaweed conditioner
description: Gives your hair an extra soft feel with the help of seaweed.
instructions: Apply conditioner in the shower on wet hair after rinsing the shampoo. Massage and rinse thoroughly

title: Youth face serum
description: Anti-age serum that prevents signs of aging.
instructions: Apply on areas like around the eyes and the mouth

title: Relaxing night serum
description: Let your skin relax with this night serum, with refreshing wheat and green tea extract
instructions: Massage onto the face with circular movements

title: H20 night cream
description: This night cream gives your skin a glow of the hydrating himalayan spring water
instructions: Apply to clean skin in the evening

title: Find your glow Facemist
description: Refreshing face mist with natural minerals.
instructions: Spray onto your face whenever you need to feel refreshed during the day

title: Find your calm Face cream
description: A calming face cream made from wheat and oat, making it the perfect match for sensitive skin
instructions: Put onto your clean face in the morning, good ti combine with Find your glow, mist.

title: Night Repair
description: Deeply repairing Antioxidant-rich face oil with vitamin E to nourish and protect your skin.
instructions: Apply in the evening, after washing and drying off your face

title: Flowy Face cream
description: Daycream that lets your skin breathe and therefore prevents clogged pores and oily sensation.
instructions: Apply to face and neck each morning after cleansing.

title: Sensitive face cream
description: Lightweight face lotion with tea tree oil and witch hazel to control oiliness and provide a matte finish.
instructions: Apply to clean skin in the morning and evening.

title: Citrus Face toner
description: Deeply cleansing toner with citrus and mint
instructions: Apply to your face and neck before bed.

title: Eucalyptus hair oil
description: Nourishing hair oil that needs some extra love,promoting healthy hair growth.
instructions: Apply onto the tips of your hair after showering.

title: Natural beard oil
description: Beard oil that softens and nourishes your beard while promoting healthy growth.
instructions: Rub a small amount between your palms and work through your beard.

title: Organic Lavender Conditioner
description: A soothing and nourishing conditioner infused with organic lavender essential oil. Gently cleanses the hair while promoting relaxation.
instructions: Apply to wet hair after the Lavender Shampoo, lather, and rinse thoroughly.
